metadata.title: CVE-2019-17383 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The netaddr gem before 2.0.4 for Ruby has misconfigured file permissions,such that a gem install may result in 0777 permissions in the targetfilesystem.

criterions.comment: ruby-netaddr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
